column1: Course Outcomes vs. Program Outcomes Curriculum Matrix

column2: Course Outcomes
column3: GCIS-1 Elicit, document, and analyze the requirements for software systems
column4: GCIS-2 Design mainstream or advanced software systems from requirements.
column5: GCIS-3 Build mainstream or advanced software systems from designs.
column6: GCIS-4 Utilize tools, languages, and environments for effective analysis, design, and development.
column7: GCIS-5 Obtain a comprehension of the evolving technology and its ramifications.
column8: GCIS-6 Identify, plan, and manage the schedule and risks for the activities involved in software-based systems development.
column9: GCIS-7 Provide a research contribution or development of value to the profession, industry or society.
column10: GCIS-8 Exhibit skills to support continued development and improvement of their professional abilities.
column11: GCIS-9 Exhibit skills necessary to make ethical decisions as a moral and conscientious individual and as a citizen of their professions, their society, and their place of employment.
column12: ACS-1 Design, build, and use effective relational databases.
column13: ACS-2 Develop and deploy digital image processing applications
column14: ACS-3 Develop and deploy digital intelligent systems applications
column15: IS-1 Identify and manipulate the knowledge-based components of systems in order to enable better decision- making or to provide stable representations.
column16: IS-2 Design and build knowledge-based systems.
column17: IS-2 Critique and manage the information resources of an organization.
column18: IS-2 Design, build, and use effective relational databases.
column19: Identify effective quality measures and organize activities to support software-based systems development.
column20: Evaluate alternative designs, and identify the best solution for a given set of software product and project constraints.
column21: Critique and recommend design improvements for computer-human interfaces
column22: Identify change-management issues, and apply effective change-management processes to maintain quality software-based systems.
column23: Design, build, and deploy database-driven web application.
column25: Develop goal-oriented, secure, artistic, interactive web sites.
